name: charge
effect: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
